item.description:
Well, maybe... Sort of.... I can ask again the FCA students and pilots who are not members to join us on a fly out for breakfast. Here's the itinerary. Depart KFIT at 8:30 for KSFM. Eat, non PIC pay for the PIC. From KSFM, we get a squawk and we head to The coastline for a scenic flight back. --------------------------------------------------------

 

 

 

Good stuff, let's work this with them. By flying students or pilots who don't fly often, we can show them the FPA way. Fly, eat, fly and have fun. I'll put the choices down as questions and lets see how many we can get to go!

 

 

We earned it, let's go flying,

Charley
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at FCA by 8:00 a.m Saturday morning For wheels up at 8:30.

group.name: Fitchburg Pilots Association/EAA Chapter 1454 Meetup Site

item.name: FPA Take A Student Flying Fly Out...
